data.name: SfGrid_Desc_Key
data.value: The PowerApps Data Grid is a feature-rich grid component for displaying data in a tabular format.

data.name: ColHeaderText_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header.

data.name: ColType_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the data type of the column.

data.name: ColEditType_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the type of component for editing.

data.name: ColFormat_Desc_Key
data.value: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data.

data.name: ColClipMode_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. Also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

data.name: ColTextAlign_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the alignment of the column in both header and content cells.

data.name: ColHeaderTextAlign_Desc_Key
data.value: Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.

data.name: ColVisible_Desc_Key
data.value: If visible is set to false, hides the particular column. By default, all columns are displayed.

data.name: ColIsPrimaryKey_Desc_Key
data.value: If isPrimaryKey is set to true, considers this column as the primary key constraint.

data.name: ColAllowSorting_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowSorting set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

data.name: ColAllowResizing_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowResizing set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.

data.name: ColAllowFiltering_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowFiltering set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

data.name: ColAllowGrouping_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowGrouping set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

data.name: ColAllowEditing_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowEditing set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

data.name: ColDisableHtmlEncode_Desc_Key
data.value: If disableHtmlEncode is set to true, it encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

data.name: ColEnableGroupByFormat_Desc_Key
data.value: If enableGroupByFormat set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values. By default no columns are group by format.

data.name: ColDisplayAsCheckBox_Desc_Key
data.value: If displayAsCheckBox is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

data.name: ColAutoFit_Desc_Key
data.value: If autoFit set to true, then the particular column content width will be adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself. Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling autoFitColumns method in the dataBound event.

data.name: ColWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the width of the column in pixels or percentage.

data.name: ColMinWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the minimum width of the column in pixels or percentage.

data.name: ColMaxWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the maximum width of the column in pixel or percentage, which will restrict resizing beyond this pixel or percentage.

data.name: EventName_Desc_Key
data.value: Output event name when OnChange is triggered.

data.name: OnError_Desc_Key
data.value: Outputs error message when onError is triggered.

data.name: PrimaryKey_Desc_Key
data.value: Primary Key value for auto generated columns data.

data.name: AllowEditing_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowEditing is set to true, values can be updated in the existing record.

data.name: AllowPaging_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowPaging is set to true, the pager renders at the footer of the Grid. It is used to handle page navigation in the Grid.

data.name: PageSize_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the number of records to be displayed per page.

data.name: PageCount_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the pager container.

data.name: AllowSorting_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowSorting is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.

data.name: AllowMultiSorting_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowMultiSorting set to true, then it will allow the user to sort multiple column in the grid.

data.name: AllowGrouping_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowGrouping set to true, then it will allow the user to dynamically group or ungroup columns. Grouping can be done by drag and drop columns from column header to group drop area.

data.name: ShowGroupedColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: If showGroupedColumn is set to false, it hides the grouped column after grouping.

data.name: AllowFiltering_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowFiltering set to true the filter bar will be displayed. If set to false the filter bar will not be displayed. Filter bar allows the user to filter grid records with required criteria.

data.name: GridLines_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the mode of grid lines.

data.name: GridLines_Default_Desc_Key
data.value: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

data.name: GridLines_Both_Desc_key
data.value: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines.

data.name: GridLines_Horizontal_Desc_Key
data.value: Displays the horizontal grid lines only.

data.name: GridLines_Vertical_Desc_Key
data.value: Displays the vertical grid lines only.

data.name: AllowTextWrap_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowTextWrap set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

data.name: AllowResizing_Desc_Key
data.value: If allowResizing is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

data.name: NoDataSource_Message
data.value: There is no data available to display at the moment.
